title: Twisted Fate
description: Author's Note: *Newly edited- 2/10/16. If you've already purchased this book you should be able to re-download the new edited version.  I had no reason to live. I was unwanted, alone, and running from a horrible past.  Just when I'm debating ending it all...I meet him.  Tristan Blake- He's controlling, he's sexy...he pushes every single button of mine.  He's also the person who will change my life forever.  He makes me feel things that I've never felt before. We have an out of this world connection with one another, and fate seems just as determined as he is to keep him by my side.  Little did I know...fate sure is twisted.  When the truth finally comes out...I'll be in for the fight of my life.  This is the story of how we met and fell in love...this is what happens before everything changes.  This book is part of a 3 book series: Twisted Fate (Book One) Twisted Wrath (Book Two) Will be released: October 22nd 2015. Twisted Love (Book Three) Will be released: December 7th 2015.  Side Note: Although the first book isn't, the entire series is considered a dark read. You've been warned.   ***Warning*** This series is not suitable for readers under 18. This series contains elements of emotional, sexual, and physical cruelty. Any readers with sensitivity to the above topics should proceed with caution, and at their own risk.
author: Ashley Jade
